duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet customers, run the register, cashier, make purchase suggestions, and sometimes work with the food program.
Work around the store in different areas to maintain high standards for store appearance and provide fast and friendly service to customers.
Interact with many customers daily and work with a fun, energetic team to accomplish daily tasks around the store.
Provide prompt, courteous customer service and handle money, checks, and other types of payment received for products sold.
Inspect store facilities and equipment for safety, cleanliness, and proper working order.
Assist in maintaining proper inventory levels and shift audits.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred.
